description: [``botocore``] Implemented new endpoint ruleset system to dynamically derive endpoints and settings for services
[``botocore``] AWS Private Certificate Authority (AWS Private CA) now offers usage modes which are combination of features to address specific use cases.
[``botocore``] This release adds support for AWS Batch on Amazon EKS.
[``botocore``] Added support for self-signed certificates when using object storage locations; added BytesCompressed to the TaskExecution response.
[``botocore``] SageMaker Inference Recommender now supports a new API ListInferenceRecommendationJobSteps to return the details of all the benchmark we create for an inference recommendation job.
